title: How to Design Modern Furniture

steps.headline: Look at old catalogues to see what defines modern furniture.
steps.description: Modern furniture is centered around clean, straight lines, and usually sticks to natural neutral and warm tones. Materials like wood, leather, linen, plywood, polished metal, and plastic are commonly used. Modern furniture tends to make spaces look clean, uncluttered, and open. Too many intricate details or frills aren’t part of modern furniture. The general design style of modern furniture was formed in the 1920s to the 1950s.

steps.headline: Collect ideas from magazines or websites of pieces that you like.
steps.description: Look through home and design magazines, and keep a note or picture of everything that you like or that may inspire your design. Similarly, use a search engine to find different types of modern furniture on design or furniture websites. It may be helpful to rip out or print pictures of everything that you like, and to then to compile these into a folder. This will help you to organize all of your ideas, and it will ensure that you don’t forget anything important that you come across. Annotate the pictures with your own comments and ideas as you go. Don’t stick to ideas just about the type of furniture. Get ideas for the type of wood or materials, fabric, shape, design, and colors.

steps.headline: Go to 2-3 furniture stores that sell modern furniture to get ideas.
steps.description: Explore any local furniture stores in your area to see how the modern pieces look in real life. Take notes on what you do and don’t like, and about any aspect of the pieces that you want to include in your design. Make sure that you try out the pieces that you like if possible. Sit in chairs that you like, and imagine how particular tables or cabinets would look in your own home. Often many of the modern furniture pieces that you like will be a compromise. For example, you may love how a dining chair looks, but find it uncomfortable to sit in. Or you may love the shape and structure of a desk, but not like the type of wood that has been used. Keep a record of all of these things, so that you can design your piece to be a perfect balance between your preferences for functionality and aesthetic.

steps.headline: Draw a rough sketch of your design.
steps.description: You don’t have to be the best artist in the world, but a rough plan will help you to communicate your ideas so that you furniture can be created. Emphasize and label any key features, materials, or parts that are important in your design. Don’t worry if you aren’t completely happy with your design. Either make a few more sketches that have slightly different features, of just wait until you find someone who will make your furniture, as they will help to fine-tune your design.

steps.headline: Find a local business that specialises in making furniture.
steps.description: Use a search engine or a phone book to find a local company in your area. Ask your family and friends if they can recommended any companies to you. Try to find a local business that concentrates on the type of furniture that you want to make. For example, if you are designing a wooden table or a couch, visit your local carpenter. However if you are designing a piece that involves a large metal or plastic element instead, contact other furniture-making companies to enquire about the work that they do. When you find some potential local business that can help you to bring your design to life, ask to see a few of their products that they have made. This will help you to see the sort of work that they do, and the general style that they add to the pieces.

steps.headline: Communicate your ideas with the carpenter or designer.
steps.description: Show them all of the designs you like, and talk about the plans that you have for designing your own modern furniture. Take into account their input, feedback, and ideas on ways to improve your design. Don’t be afraid to give feedback on the plans that the carpenter or designer comes up with based on your ideas. Although it’s important to listen to their professional opinion about how the piece looks and the functionality of it, ultimately the modern furniture will be in your design, so you need to be happy with it.

steps.headline: Place your order for the furniture to be made.
steps.description: Book in your design to get the process started. Ask any questions that you may have, especially about the cost and expected length of time that the piece will take.

steps.headline: Go to a local upholsterer if necessary.
steps.description: If you are making a chair, sofa, or other piece of furniture that requires fabric, you may need to visit a different company who can provide this service. Communicate your ideas again, and show them the piece of furniture and any design plans that you may have. Make sure to ask questions about the estimated cost and length of time that it will take so that you know what to expect.

steps.headline: Place your new piece of modern furniture in your own home.
steps.description: You have probably pictured exactly where the piece will go and how it will look throughout the design process. Move any existing furniture or objects out of the way to clear some room, and enjoy how your design has become part of your home! If you aren’t sure exactly where you want your new piece to go, experiment with different places in your home to see what location you like the best.
